long_description: With a futuristic look and sleek design, the uvex Race 3 bike helmet is built for ambitious road cyclists who demand the best. It offers excellent aerodynamics and ventilation. Double in-mold helmet construction bonds a flyweight shell to a high-quality expanded polystyrene foam liner for excellent strength; a second shell covers the lower helmet. uvex Race 3 bike helmet is designed to maintain structural integrity and even pressure distribution in the event of a crash or impact. Width and height-adjustable fit system guarantees a comfortable fit; easy to adjust with one hand. 22 vents thrust cool, fresh air over and around the head while forcing heat and stale air out. Overstock.
